src:
Galeri Foto
Kulineran Ivo Sugianto Sabran, Istri Cantik Gubernur Kalteng
05 Nov 2019, 15:00 by Instagram yulistraivo - detikFood
Jakarta - Ivo adalah istri dari Gubernur Kalimantan Tengah (Kalteng), Sugianto Sabran. Ia eksis di Instagram dan kerap membagikan momen kulineran yang seru.


Ivo merupakan istri kedua Sugianto setelah ia bercerai dari artis Ussy Sulistiawaty yang dinikahi tahun 2005. Ivo sering menemani sang suami dalam menjalani aktivitasnya sebagai kepala daerah. Foto: Instagram yulistraivo



Keduanya dikaruniai dua anak perempuan yang menggemaskan. Ivo pun sering membagikan unggahan foto pada 24.000 followers-nya di Instagram. Foto: Instagram yulistraivo



Sayangnya nama sang suami baru-baru ini diberitakan negatif usai aksinya melempar botol ke Stadion Tuah Pahoe, Palangka Raya. Saat itu tengah berlangsung pertandingan bola Kalteng Putra versus Persib Bandung. Foto: Instagram yulistraivo



 Pemilik nama lengkap Yulistra Ivo Azhari ini sedang menikmati jamuan makan malam resmi. Ia berfoto dengan istri Tito Karnavian yang dipujinya sebagai sosok baik dan pintar. Foto: Instagram yulistraivo



Bersama ibu-ibu PKK, Ivo sedang memanen hasil kebun. "Alhamdulillah sudah bisa panen sayur mayur, buah buahan dan beberapa tanaman obat," tulisnya. Foto: Instagram yulistraivo



Kali ini Ivo menemani istri Jusuf Kalla, Mufidah. Keduanya berada di dalam mobil dengan suguhan buah segar seperti salak, pisang, dan kelengkeng. Foto: Instagram yulistraivo



Kalimantan Tengah memecahkan rekor MURI dengan menyelenggarakan festival 62.000 tongkol jagung bakar. Ivo dan suaminya pun turut serta menyukseskan acara ini. Foto: Instagram yulistraivo



Ivo banyak melakukan aktivitas sosial. Seperti ketika ia ikut senam bersama anak-anak PAUD dan TK. Ivo mendukung kampanye agar anak-anak cukup minum air agar tubuhnya sehat. Foto: Instagram yulistraivo



Begini kemesraan Ivo dan Sugianto saat kulineran. Sang suami tak segan menyuapi makanan ke mulut istrinya. Foto: Instagram yulistraivo



Di pesawat, Ivo menikmati makanan enak. Ia terlihat memilih nasi goreng, lengkap dengan beberapa menu nikmat lainnya.  Foto: Instagram yulistraivo
text:
Photo Gallery
Kulineran Ivo Sugianto Sabran, Beautiful Wife of the Governor of Central Kalimantan
05 Nov 2019, 15:00 by Instagram yulistraivo - detikFood
Jakarta - Ivo is the wife of the Governor of Central Kalimantan (Central Kalimantan), Sugianto Sabran. He exists on Instagram and often shares exciting culinary moments.


Ivo is Sugianto's second wife after he divorced from artist Ussy Sulistiawaty who was married in 2005. Ivo often accompanies her husband in carrying out his activities as regional head. Photo: Instagram yulistraivo



Both of them are blessed with two adorable daughters. Ivo often shares photos uploaded to his 24,000 followers on Instagram. Photo: Instagram yulistraivo



Unfortunately her husband's name was recently reported negative after the action of throwing a bottle at the Tuah Pahoe Stadium, Palangka Raya. At that time the Kalteng Putra soccer match versus Persib Bandung was underway. Photo: Instagram yulistraivo



The owner's full name Yulistra Ivo Azhari is enjoying an official dinner. He took a picture with Tito Karnavian's wife who he praised as a good and smart figure. Photo: Instagram yulistraivo



Together with the PKK ladies, Ivo is harvesting the crops. "Alhamdulillah, we have been able to harvest vegetables, fruits and some medicinal plants," he wrote. Photo: Instagram yulistraivo



This time Ivo accompanied Jusuf Kalla's wife, Mufidah. Both are in the car with a treat of fresh fruit such as salak, bananas, and longan. Photo: Instagram yulistraivo



Central Kalimantan broke the MURI record by holding a festival of 62,000 roasted corn cobs. Ivo and her husband also made the event a success. Photo: Instagram yulistraivo



Ivo does a lot of social activities. Like when he joined gymnastics with PAUD and kindergarten children. Ivo supports the campaign so that children drink enough water to keep their bodies healthy. Photo: Instagram yulistraivo



This is the intimacy of Ivo and Sugianto when cooking. The husband did not hesitate to feed food to his wife's mouth. Photo: Instagram yulistraivo



On the plane, Ivo enjoyed good food. He was seen choosing fried rice, complete with several other delicious menus. Photo: Instagram yulistraivo
